name: Fish Sharks
notes: Get to fishin Willard! Requires 76 Fishing and a harpoon

name: Chop Magic or Yew Logs
notes: Use a dragon axe for faster chopping

name: Motherlode Mine
notes: Great for mining XP and collecting ores

name: Kill Vorkath
notes: Bring Ranged gear and Super Antifire potions

notes: Requires Dwarf Cannon quest and steel bars

name: Cook Karambwan
notes: One-tick cooking method for faster XP

name: Herb Run
notes: Check all herb patches with magic secateurs

name: Blast Furnace
notes: Great for smithing XP and making bars

name: Volcanic Ash
notes: Collect ash from the Volcanic Mine for Ultracompost

name: Gather Herblore Secondaries
notes: Mushrooms, Red Spiders' Eggs, Snape grass, Oh my!

name: Do a Corrupted Gauntlet
notes: To the Red Prison with you!

name: Pyramid Plunder
notes: Great for Thieving XP and Sarcophagus loot

name: Make Blood Runes
notes: Requires 77 Runecrafting and a Blood Essence

name: Hunt Herbivore
notes: POH > Regen Stamina > Fossil Island > Collect > Repeat
